description: Log request and response data over UDP to Loggly.

host.description: The IP address or host name of Loggly server.

port.description: The UDP port to send data to on the Loggly server.

tags.description: An optional list of tags to support segmentation & filtering of logs.

timeout.description: An optional timeout in milliseconds when sending data to the Loggly server.

successful_severity.description: An optional logging severity assigned to the all successful requests with response status code 400.

client_errors_severity.description: An optional logging severity assigned to the all failed requests with response status code 400 or higher but less than 500.

server_errors_severity.description: An optional logging severity assigned to the all failed requests with response status code 500 or higher.

log_level.description: An optional logging severity, any request with equal or higher severity will be logged to Loggly.
